name: Andrei Sator
description: A powerful Russian oligarch and arms dealer dealing with inverted time technology.

content.title: Background
content.body: Andrei Sator is a Russian oligarch born in the former Soviet Union. He rose from humble beginnings in the Soviet secret cities where he later acquired control of an inverted detonation device.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Sator is ruthless, ambitious, and driven by a desire for control and power. He is highly manipulative, often using those around him to achieve his own ends, and displays a cold, calculating demeanor.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Sator serves as the main antagonist in 'Tenet,' attempting to trigger a world-ending event using inversed time technology. His actions set the plot into motion and he becomes the primary obstacle for the Protagonist and Neil.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Sator is married to Kat, who becomes an important figure in his plans and someone he manipulates emotionally. His relationship with her is abusive and controlling. He is a key adversary to the Protagonist and Neil in their mission to stop him.

content.title: Abilities
content.body: Sator has significant influence and resources at his disposal as an oligarch. He understands and uses inverted time technology to his advantage, posing a significant threat to the protagonists.
